mapper.select:
SELECT p.paibanid, p.expertid, p.`name`, p.guahaoleibie, date_format(p.paibanriqi, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as paibanriqi, p.shangxiawu, p.xianhaoshu, p.shengyuhaoshu, p.jiage, p.zhuangtai FROM paibanguanli AS p
where expertid = #{expertid} and p.paibanriqi>=date_format(Now(),'%Y-%m-%d') order by p.paibanriqi asc,p.shangxiawu asc

select pbgl.paibanid,pbgl.expertid,pbgl.name,pbgl.shangxiawu,pbgl.xianhaoshu,pbgl.shengyuhaoshu,pbgl.jiahaobingzhong,pbgl.jiahaoshu,date_format(pbgl.paibanriqi,'%Y-%m-%d') as paibanriqi,pbgl.jiage,ep.*, a.url as imageurl from paibanguanli AS pbgl INNER JOIN expert AS ep ON ep.expertid = pbgl.expertid LEFT JOIN attatchment a ON a.ownerid = ep.expertid where pbgl.name like CONCAT('%',#{ppName},'%') and date_format(pbgl.paibanriqi, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{mmPaiBanRiQi} and pbgl.shangxiawu = #{ppShangxiawu} order by pbgl.paibanriqi desc,pbgl.shangxiawu asc

select pbgl.paibanid,pbgl.expertid,pbgl.name,pbgl.shangxiawu,pbgl.xianhaoshu,pbgl.shengyuhaoshu,date_format(pbgl.paibanriqi,'%Y-%m-%d') as paibanriqi,pbgl.jiage,ep.*, a.url as imageurl from paibanguanli AS pbgl INNER JOIN expert AS ep ON ep.expertid = pbgl.expertid LEFT JOIN attatchment a ON a.ownerid = ep.expertid where pbgl.paibanid = #{paibanid} order by pbgl.name
mapper.sql: paibanid, expertid, name, guahaoleibie, paibanriqi, shangxiawu, xianhaoshu, shengyuhaoshu, jiage, zhuangtai, jiahaobingzhong, jiahaoshu
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from paibanguanli
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into paibanguanli
paibanid,
expertid,
name,
guahaoleibie,
paibanriqi,
shangxiawu,
xianhaoshu,
shengyuhaoshu,
jiage,
zhuangtai,
jiahaobingzhong,
jiahaoshu,
#{paibanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{guahaoleibie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paibanriqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{shangxiawu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xianhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{shengyuhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{jiage,jdbcType=REAL},
#{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{jiahaobingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jiahaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update paibanguanli
paibanid = #{record.paibanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expertid = #{record.expertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guahaoleibie = #{record.guahaoleibie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paibanriqi = #{record.paibanriqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shangxiawu = #{record.shangxiawu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xianhaoshu = #{record.xianhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shengyuhaoshu = #{record.shengyuhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jiage = #{record.jiage,jdbcType=REAL},
zhuangtai = #{record.zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jiahaobingzhong = #{record.jiahaobingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jiahaoshu = #{record.jiahaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update paibanguanli set paibanid = #{record.paibanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expertid = #{record.expertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guahaoleibie = #{record.guahaoleibie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paibanriqi = #{record.paibanriqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shangxiawu = #{record.shangxiawu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xianhaoshu = #{record.xianhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shengyuhaoshu = #{record.shengyuhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiage = #{record.jiage,jdbcType=REAL}, zhuangtai = #{record.zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiahaobingzhong = #{record.jiahaobingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiahaoshu = #{record.jiahaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update paibanguanli
expertid = #{expertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guahaoleibie = #{guahaoleibie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paibanriqi = #{paibanriqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shangxiawu = #{shangxiawu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xianhaoshu = #{xianhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shengyuhaoshu = #{shengyuhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jiage = #{jiage,jdbcType=REAL},
zhuangtai = #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jiahaobingzhong = #{jiahaobingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jiahaoshu = #{jiahaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where paibanid = #{paibanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update paibanguanli set expertid = #{expertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guahaoleibie = #{guahaoleibie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paibanriqi = #{paibanriqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shangxiawu = #{shangxiawu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xianhaoshu = #{xianhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shengyuhaoshu = #{shengyuhaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiage = #{jiage,jdbcType=REAL}, zhuangtai = #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiahaobingzhong = #{jiahaobingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiahaoshu = #{jiahaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER} where paibanid = #{paibanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
